definitions.definition: a quick hit with the flat part of the hand or other flat object:
examples: She gave her son a slap for behaving badly.

definitions.definition: an action that insults or upsets someone:
examples: It was a real slap in the face for him when she refused to go out to dinner with him.

definitions.definition: the action of hitting someone in a friendly way on the back in order to show praise for something they have done:
examples: He won - give him a slap on the back.
The police officer gave Minna a slap on the wrist for not wearing her seat belt.
The football player kicked the ball slap into the middle of the net.

definitions.definition: to hit someone or something with the flat part of the hand or other flat object:
